scripts.chain: shx rm ~/.foundry/keystores/scaffold-eth-default 2>/dev/null; cast wallet import --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 --unsafe-password '' scaffold-eth-default && anvil
scripts.deploy: yarn check-keystore && forge build --build-info --build-info-path out/build-info/ && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --account scaffold-eth-default --rpc-url ${1:-default_network} --broadcast --legacy && node scripts-js/generateTsAbis.js
scripts.deploy:verify: yarn check-keystore && forge build --build-info --build-info-path out/build-info/ && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --account scaffold-eth-default --rpc-url ${1:-default_network} --broadcast --legacy --verify ; node scripts-js/generateTsAbis.js
scripts.account:generate: shx rm ~/.foundry/keystores/scaffold-eth-default 2>/dev/null ; cast wallet import scaffold-eth-default --private-key $(cast wallet new | grep 'Private key:' | awk '{print $3}')
scripts.account:import: shx rm ~/.foundry/keystores/scaffold-eth-default 2>/dev/null ; cast wallet import scaffold-eth-default --interactive
scripts.verify: forge build --build-info --build-info-path out/build-info/ && forge script script/VerifyAll.s.sol --ffi --rpc-url ${1:-default_network}
scripts.check-keystore: shx cat ~/.foundry/keystores/scaffold-eth-default >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "Keystore directory does not exist. Please run 'yarn account:generate' or 'yarn account:import' to create it." && exit 1; }
